H1.text: who was elected president of the united states in 1928. Calvin Coolidge

H2.text: who was elected president of the united states in 1928. Charles Curtis

H3.text: who was elected president of the united states in 1928. Herbert Hoover

A4.text: Hoover won the presidential nomination on the first ballot of the 1928 Republican National Convention.

A5.text: Hoover decisively defeated Smith on election day, taking 58 percent of the popular vote and 444 of the 531 electoral votes.
